name: Libertatis
description:
Libertatis is a simple 2D platform game where you control a slave in search of freedom. The game takes place in a cave where there are skeletons with muskets and swords that will try to kill you before you reach Corsair's territory.

🤝🏻 Contributors

  • Alberto Luigi Venciguerra - Graphic Design, Level Design
  • Bruno Ganade Alves - UI/UX, SFX, OST
  • Fabrício Pinto Ferreira - Coding and testing
  • Gabriel Henrique Mantovani De Oliveira - Screenplay
  • João Frederico Kraft Cuppi - UI/UX, Level Design
  • Jonatas Freire - UI/UX
  • Leonardo Rezende Nakashima - Coding and testing
